paper_abstract: The present article deals with fictitious domain methods for numerical realization of scalar variational inequalities with the Signorini type conditions on the boundary. Two variants are introduced and analyzed. A discretization is done by finite elements. It leads to a system of non-smooth, piecewise linear equations. This system is solved by the semismooth Newton method. Numerical experiments confirm the efficiency of this approach.
paper_title: Fictitious domain formulations of unilateral problems: analysis and algorithms
